value:
$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Hmm...$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|Is something bothering you, Leanne?$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|That man...$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_双界アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Deen? I've heard he can be a bit of a
loner. But he's good to have on your
side in a fight.$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Yes, a loner... I feel it... He is...very
lonely...$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|Maybe he avoids people for a reason.
He wouldn't be the only one with a
troubled past around here.$k$pI know how much it can hurt to hold
a secret inside you. It can be...
suffocating.$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Suffocating... Yes...$k$p

$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Mister...Deen?$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|Yeah? What do you want? The fight's
over. If you couldn't tell, I'm trying to
rest. Which I suggest you do as well.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|I... I want to sing...a song. A song...
for you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|A song? Look, I'm not interested right
now. Maybe go find someone who'd
be more...appreciative.$k$p$WmMPID_双界アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Don't be so grumpy. Sitting around
doing nothing can get pretty boring.
What's the harm in hearing one song?$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|Great. You're here too. Why exactly
are you two bothering me?$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|I just want...to calm your nerves.
Soothe your...stormy heart.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|My— Hah! Look, if you actually think a
song can—$k$p$WmMPID_双界アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Listen or don't—we're not going to
force you. But we're going to sing
either way. Ready, Leanne?$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Yes!$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|Ugh. Fine. I'll listen. But only for a
minute or two...$k$p
